forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clouds and some sun this morning with more clouds for this afternoon. High near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low -4C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 23F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early, with a steadier snow developing late in the day. High -4C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers becoming a steady accumulating snow later on. High 24F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 80%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will taper off and give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around -5C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will taper off and give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 21F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 30F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low around -5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 22F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High 26F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 11F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High around -5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 21F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low around 15F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. High -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. High 29F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 24F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers becoming a steady accumulating snow later on. High around 0C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers early and steady snow likely later in the day. High 31F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will mix with and change to rain overnight. Low -2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low 28F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 3C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. High 36F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 1C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 33F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers mixing with rain in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers mixing with rain in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers later on. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening. The rain and snow will change to rain showers overnight. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light snow in the evening will transition to snow showers overnight. Low near 0C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Light snow in the evening will give way to snow showers overnight. Low 31F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.
